item.title: Computer Engineering (BEng), National University of Singapore
item.description: Academic Career & Achievements üî∏ Top Student for CG1111A, AY21/22 Semester 1 üî∏ Teaching Assistant for CG1111A, AY22/23 Semester 1

item.title: FindNUS :telescope:
item.description: Executive Summary: Awarded the highest level of achivement, given to the top 7% of teams (top 29 of 414 teams) for NUS School of Computing’s 2022 iteration of Orbital. FindNUS is a lost and found web app built during Summer 2022 Orbital. As the backend developer, I built a RESTful API backend using a microservices architecture. Apart from regular CRUD, we also used some NLP and fuzzy searching to help lost people find their lost stuff.

item.title: HackerTrail, Software Developer Intern
item.description: HackerTrail uses data-driven technology to evaluate and connect software professionals to employers. Developed on the ‚ÄúCandidate Testing Platform‚Äù using React, bringing to production many new features and UI changes as part of a complete UX revamp effort Developed on the “Employer Management Platform”, extending on existing features using Angular Rapid prototyping of different frameworks to appraise SEO efficacy for company‚Äôs public-facing website Prototyped a backend API MVP using FastAPI for streamlining messaging pipelines Technologies: React, Angular, Typescript, Hugo, HTML/CSS, Git, Python

item.title: SnipNScan :camera:
item.description: Executive Summary: Using OpenCV and Tesseract, I built a QR code and text scanner because too much text in this world is embedded in images and are un-copypasteable. Think of images of code. üî∏ Project Blogpost üî∏ Project Link

item.title: TOFFS Technologies, Software Engineer Intern
item.description: TOFFS provides Multi-CDN and cybersecurity solutions for Enterprise networking. Integrated an Anti-DDoS machine learning (ML) script into existing workflows to provide real-time DDoS protection to TOFFS’ customers Processed large amounts of data (approx 2.5 TB worth) to train multiple ML models with concurrent programming Optimized model training efficiency and achieved up to 50% reduction in training time Technologies: Golang, Python, MySQL, Graylogs, REST APIs, Docker, Linux, Git Testimonial about my time at TOFFS kindly done by Co-Founder Jason Kong.
